name: Ponzu Plum Sauce
recipeIngredient: 3 Tbsp. neri ume paste (3 Tbsp. extra plum sauce can be substituted)
recipeInstructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the plum dipping sauce ingredients: ponzu sauce, neri ume, and plum sauce.  Add the chili oil last, mixing gently.  The oil will float on top of the sauce.
